# magnificationFilter

**Instance Property**

The filter used when increasing the size of the content.

## Declaration

```swift
var magnificationFilter: CALayerContentsFilter { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values for this property are listed in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/scaling-filters].

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerContentsFilter/linear].

[/documentation/quartzcore/calayer/1410907-magnificationfilter#2851435] shows the difference between linear and nearest filtering when a 10 x 10 point image of a circle is magnified by a scale of 10.



The circle on the left uses [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerContentsFilter/linear] and the circle on the right uses [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayerContentsFilter/nearest].

## Layer filters

- **filters**: An array of Core Image filters to apply to the contents of the layer and its sublayers. Animatable.
- **compositingFilter**: A CoreImage filter used to composite the layer and the content behind it. Animatable.
- **backgroundFilters**: An array of Core Image filters to apply to the content immediately behind the layer. Animatable.
- **minificationFilter**: The filter used when reducing the size of the content.
- **minificationFilterBias**: The bias factor used by the minification filter to determine the levels of detail.
